name: Draughts: London's first board game café
blurb: London's first board game café: good food, fresh coffee, quality beer and thousands of board games. Learn to play, love and make games.

name: Kent Walker Artisan Cheese Tasting Room
blurb: KWAC finally has its own space!  We need to do some light construction to get the tasting room ready for cheese, beer, & wine.

name: The Rook & Pawn Board Game Cafe
blurb: Located in Athens, GA, we will be one of the first board game cafes in the Southeast US

name: BOOM! Museum of Food and Drink's Explosive First Exhibit
blurb: Meet the puffing gun: a whirling 3,200-pound machine that explosively puffs food. We're making it the first MOFAD exhibit.

name: Foodseum (Chicago's first food museum)
blurb: Help us open Foodseum's first interactive exhibit by Spring 2015.

name: The Pocket Theater - No one should have to pay to perform!
blurb: A new performance space in Seattle. A place for artists, comedians, and audiences to meet and collaborate!

name: Nordo's Culinarium: Where Food Meets Art
blurb: A place where innovation, food, creativity and performance live year round in a historic building in Pioneer Square.

name: A Home for Comedy in Vermont!
blurb: ONLY HOURS LEFT ON THE CAMPAIGN! Our stretch goal is $35k; let's build a home for standup/improv shows & classes in VT!

name: Sea Tea Improv's Comedy Theater in Hartford, CT
blurb: A permanent home for comedy in Connecticut in the heart of downtown Hartford.

name: Preserve our planet, one 'Throw to Grow' pack at a time
blurb: We aim to limit the potentially catastrophic consequences of the world’s bee population disappearing: Throw to Grow Bee Super-Mix

name: Bard Beyond the Big Top
blurb: The Bard has burst beyond the big top and we're reaching out to our Beloved Benefactors to help build our festival's future.

name: Good Good Comedy Theatre (Philadelphia, PA)
blurb: The creators of Five Dollar Comedy Week are building a permanent home for affordable live comedy shows and classes in Philadelphia.

name: Higher Education
blurb: Support the circus arts and help our aerial students work with more height. With your support, we will install beams at 19ft!

name: Circadium: School of Contemporary Circus - Start Up
blurb: Give contemporary circus an artistic home in America.  Help us launch the nation’s first higher education program for circus.

name: The Comedy Project
blurb: An improv, sketch and experimental comedy and cocktail venue in downtown Grand Rapids, Michigan

name: Jaté Yoga Studio, Rowayton CT
blurb: Creating a pop-up space to bring yoga & mindful movement to Rowayton, CT for 7 months (Oct 1– Apr 30 2017).

name: Block & Bottle: Butchery, Charcuterie & Craft Beer Shop
blurb: Our aim is to become the go to place for high quality, locally sourced free range meat and craft beer in Newcastle & Gateshead.

name: Sylvia Center for the Arts
blurb: A new, multi-venue performing arts center in Bellingham, WA, providing affordable space for performances, classes and events.

name: Connect rising CoWomen & shake up the (working) world!
blurb: CoWomen - Community Club & Coworking Space. Wir verbinden aufstrebende Frauen und rütteln die (Arbeits-)Welt auf.

name: Sightsee Shop & Coffee Bar
blurb: Part retail-shop, part coffee bar, Sightsee is a place to discover independent brands & specialty coffee in downtown Charleston, SC!

name: CREM
blurb: Social fine dining: Modern eclectic 8 course Indian tasting menu

name: NK STUDIOS: Movement, Dance, Art, & Community
blurb: Help us turn car shop USAUTOCARE into a community movement, dance, and art hub in Bingen, Washington!

name: Kow Kow | RI's First Bubble Waffle Shop
blurb: Kow Kow is ready to grow from a small food truck to a brick-and-mortar shop in Providence!

name: Block 1750: More space for community
blurb: We are a dance-focused community center looking to expand our dance space and offer more classes to more students in a safe way!

name: The Mighty Bin: Package Free Grocery Store
blurb: A community store offering package free, sustainable, and non-toxic food, personal care, and household products.

name: The Goods Neighborhood Market
blurb: The Goods is a new local convenience store and coffee counter to open in Topsham, Maine.

name: East Austin Gets Black Woman Owned Bakery & Program for Kids
blurb: More than cake...quick demand cakes for all occasions, a case of sweets & a sweet mentorship program for home bakery entrepreneurs.

name: Bring our LGBTQ+ Black & Brown led Yoga Studio to life in SD
blurb: I'm OwlRare and I am thrilled to be opening an LGBTQ+ & Black led yoga studio in City Heights San Diego with your support!

name: Iris: A Sustainable Neighbourhood Bakery
blurb: Everyday bread and provisions made from produce that nourishes the Earth in the same way our bakery will nourish its community.

name: Cat cafe.gr - The first experience cafe in Athens, Greece
blurb: Cat cafe.gr - An amazing place that combines coffee with cats. More people hanging out with cats means more adoptions.

name: Auld Hag's Scottish Deli: The Shoap
blurb: Help us open our deli in London which will showcase small Scottish producers and show you how good Scottish food and drink really is.

name: Sake Secret: A Japanese Sake Shop for SoCal
blurb: Help us grow from a successful pop-up to a new brick-and-mortar location and make Japanese sake accessible to all!
